Assignment 2 instructions

These are the instruction for the assignment where i created an existing project demonstrating the use of a headless CMS in the context of modern web development practices.

Published Date: November 13, 2024
Lab2

In this lab 2, I explored and experimented with headless CMS platforms like Strapi, Contentful, Sanity, Prismic, and Ghost. I tested a few systems, documented my findings, and explained my final choice for my project’s content management solution through screenshots, code samples, and detailed justification.

Published Date: November 09, 2024
Assignment1

Hey there! For Assignment 1, I worked on building a cool 11ty project. The goal was to explore modern web development practices and create a unique static site based on a theme I chose. This wasn’t just about coding—it was about getting creative, staying organized, and showing off what I could do. I learned how to use 11ty’s features like layouts, collections, pagination, and even some tools like SASS for styling. On top of that, I set up a professional-looking site with a proper header, footer, and pages like About and 404. By the end, I had a polished project that looked great, worked smoothly, and proved I had the skills to build modern, responsive sites. It was a fun and rewarding experience!

Published Date: November 06, 2024
